review: Ok..... Now I can write a review.  This is one of the few things the daughter asked for for Christmas.  We found it to be cheaper from Amazon than from Apple even using a company (other than Apple of course) discount.  She installed it at our house over the holidays and in her home a few days later.  She loves it.
author: Jimmy

review: Great product. It's so convenient to play the video from my iphone, ipad, Macbook to my TV.
